lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

active.name: Blink
active.desc: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.

active.name: Overwhelming Blink
active.desc:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds, and take damage equal to 200 + 100% of your strength. Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.

active.name: Swift Blink
active.desc:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed, +50 Attack Speed, and +50 Attack Damage for 6 seconds. Swift Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.

active.name: Arcane Blink
active.desc:
Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, you gain 25% Ability Cooldown Reduction and 50% Cast Point reduction for 6 seconds. Arcane Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

passive.name: Pierce
passive.desc: Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.desc: Destroy a target tree. Cast Range: 350

passive.name: Quell
passive.desc: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 12 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
Elemental protection from magical assaults.

passive.name: Magical Damage Block
passive.desc: Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage. Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.desc: Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.

use.name: Consume
use.desc: Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.

passive.name: Shade Sight
passive.desc: Grants 400 bonus night vision.

lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

use.name: Plant Tree
use.desc:
Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: 400

lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.
A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.desc: Heals the attacker for 15% of attack damage dealt.

lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.

passive.name: Spell Lifesteal
passive.desc:
10% of spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type.

Lifesteal reduced to 2% against creeps.

lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.
A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
Fleet footwear, increasing movement.

Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.

passive.name: True Sight
passive.desc: Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier.

passive.name: Everlasting
passive.desc: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc: Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

active.name: Ghost Form
active.desc: You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

use.name: Replenish
use.desc:
Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250

lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

use.name: Salve
use.desc:
Grants 40 health regeneration to the target for 10 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250

lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.

use.name: Reveal
use.desc: Reveals and slows invisible heroes by -20% in a 1050 radius around the caster for 12 seconds.

lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

active.name: Regenerate
active.desc:
Consumes a charge to restore 115 health and 65 mana over 2.5 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: 350

passive.name: Store Rune
passive.desc:
Runes can be stored in the bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 2 minutes.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

use.name: Plant
use.desc:
Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 900 radius.

Lasts 8 minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.

Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

Range: 500

lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

use.name: Devour
use.desc:
Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with 3 charges.

Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: 165

lore: Om nom nom.

use.name: Devour
use.desc:
Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Tree Range: 165

lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.

use.name: Deploy Courier
use.desc: Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.

use.name: Upgrade Courier
use.desc: Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base. Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

lore: What a hero truly needs.

use.name: Teleport
use.desc: After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

upgrade.name: Town Portal Scroll
upgrade.desc: Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.

lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

upgrade.name: Town Portal Scroll
upgrade.desc: Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage.

lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

active.name: Phase
active.desc: Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.

lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.
Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.
A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

active.name: Switch Attribute
active.desc: Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.

lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

active.name: Transmute
active.desc:
Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience.

Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.

Range: 600

lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.

passive.name: Witch Blade
passive.desc: Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 3 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 1x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
A small gemstone attached to several chains.
A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

active.name: Restore
active.desc: Heals 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.

passive.name: Mekansm Aura
passive.desc: Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

passive.name: Vladmir's Aura
passive.desc: Grants 15% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.75 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Radius: 1200

lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

passive.name: Buckler Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 2 armor to allied player units.

Radius: 1200

lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

passive.name: Basilius Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 1 mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.

active.name: Energy Charge
active.desc: Target an allied unit to instantly restore 15 health and mana per charge stored. Max 20 charges. Automatically gains a charge every 10 seconds and whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

passive.name: Holy Blessing
passive.desc: Amplifies heals you provide by 35%.

passive.name: Regeneration Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 3 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

active.name: Barrier
active.desc:
Gives a shield that blocks 400 magic damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

Radius: 1200

passive.name: Insight Aura
passive.desc:
Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

Radius: 1200

lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

active.name: Soul Release
active.desc:
Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. Lasts 8 seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.

Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 950

lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

passive.name: Regeneration Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

active.name: Hex
active.desc:
Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.

Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: 800

lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

active.name: Soul Burn
active.desc:
Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: 900

lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.

active.name: Soul Rend
active.desc:
Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 30% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike and 100% chance to crit for 130% damage.

Range: 900

lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.

passive.name: Echo Strike
passive.desc: Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

active.name: Cyclone
active.desc:
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 550
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.

active.name: Cyclone
active.desc:
Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 550
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.

passive.name: Aethereal Focus
passive.desc: Increases targeted spell and item cast range by 225.

lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

active.name: Force
active.desc:
Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.

Range: 550

lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.

active.name: Hurricane Thrust
active.desc:
Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 5 seconds, allows you to make 4 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.

Works like Force Staff when used on self or allies.

Allied Range: 550
Enemy Range: 400

passive.name: Dragon's Reach
passive.desc: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

active.name: Energy Burst
active.desc:
Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Upgradable.

Damage: 400,500,600,700,800
Range: 700,750,800,850,900
Mana Cost: 120,140,160,180,200

lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.desc: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.desc: Upgrades the ultimate, and some abilities, of all heroes.

lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.desc: Upgrades one of your abilities.

lore: With origins known only to a single wizard, fragments of this impossible crystal are nearly as coveted as the renowned scepter itself.

passive.name: Ability Upgrade
passive.desc: Upgrades one of your abilities.

lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

active.name: Reset Cooldowns
active.desc: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

passive.name: Assault Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 30 attack speed and 5 armor to nearby allied units and structures, and decreases nearby enemy unit and structure armor by -5.

Radius: 1200

lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

active.name: Avatar Grants Spell Immunity.
active.desc:
Duration decreases with each use.

Duration: 9,8,7,6
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

active.name: Arctic Blast
active.desc:
Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4 seconds.

Radius: 900

passive.name: Freezing Aura
passive.desc: Reduces the attack speed of all enemies by -45 and all heals, regeneration and lifesteal by 25%. Radius: 1200

lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

active.name: Bloodpact
active.desc: Converts 30% of your max mana to health regeneration over 2 seconds.

passive.name: Mana Battery
passive.desc: Each charge provides 0.2 MP regen and 0.35% Spell Amp. Nearby kills provide 1 charges. Dying causes you to lose 3 charges. Starts with 14 charges.

lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

passive.name: Spellblock
passive.desc: Blocks most targeted spells once every 12 seconds.

active.name: Transfer Spellblock
active.desc:
Temporarily removes Spellblock from the item's owner and transfers it to an allied unit for 12 seconds.

Range: 700

lore: The jewel at its center still reflects a pale image of its creator.

active.name: Echo Shell
active.desc:
Applies a shield to the target unit for 6 seconds which re-casts most targeted spells back to their caster.

The shielded unit will still take damage from the spell. Range: 900
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

active.name: Meteor Hammer CHANNELED -
active.desc:
After a successful channel, summons a meteor that strikes a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage over time to enemies units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75 Building Over Time Damage: 60 Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 Non-Building Over Time Damage: 90 Channel Duration: 2.5 seconds.

Landing Time: 0.5 seconds.

active.name: Nullify
active.desc:
Dispels the target and applies a debuff for 5 seconds. Continuously dispels the target. Anytime the target is attacked, it will be slowed by 80% for 0.5 seconds.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.name: Combo Breaker
passive.desc: When you take damage and your health falls below 70%, a strong dispel is applied and you gain a 2.5 second buff that provides +75% Status Resistance and causes all damage you deal and are dealt to be reduced to zero. Only triggers on player based damage.

active.name: Soul Release
active.desc:
When used against enemies, it reduces health by 4% of current health per second, and reduces HP regeneration, healing, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by 45%. Deals 35 damage per second. When used on allies, it provides 40 health regeneration per second. Lasts 8 seconds.

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.

Only the closest Spirit Vessel to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 950

lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.desc: Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

lore: A cuirass originally built to protect against the dreaded Year Beast.

active.name: Guard
active.desc:
For 12 seconds, grant nearby allied heroes and buildings a 100% chance to block 70 damage from each incoming attack.

Units may only be affected by Guard once every 40 seconds.

Radius: 1200

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.desc: Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

active.name: Damage Return
active.desc: For 4.5 seconds, the damage returned from all sources is increased by 80%.

passive.name: Damage Return
passive.desc: Everytime you are attacked, you return 20 damage plus 20% of the attack damage dealt to you.

lore: Regain lost courage.
A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

active.name: Barrier
active.desc:
Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 325 magical damage.

Lasts 12 seconds.

lore: A pristine hood that feeds upon strife to empower its owner.

active.name: Shroud
active.desc:
Creates a spell shield that absorbs up to 400 magical damage, converting damage taken into mana.

Lasts 12 seconds.

lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

passive.name: Everlasting
passive.desc: Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed. Becomes unusable if picked up by an ally of its owner until it is returned to its owner. It is immediately usable by anybody if an enemy of the owner picks it up and is killed. A dropped Rapier cannot be picked up by a courier.

lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

passive.name: Pierce
passive.desc: Grants each attack a 80% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

toggle.name: Burn
toggle.desc:
When active, scorches enemies for 60 magical damage per second, and causes them to miss 17% of their attacks. Illusions deal 35 magical damage per second.

Radius: 700

lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.desc: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 225% damage.

lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

passive.name: Bash
passive.desc:
Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.

Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

active.name: Chop Tree
active.desc:
Destroy a target tree.

Cast Range: 350

passive.name: Quell
passive.desc: Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 18 for melee heroes, and 6 for ranged.

passive.name: Cleave
passive.desc: Deals 70% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target. Deals 40% against creeps. (Melee Only)

lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

active.name: Mirror Image
active.desc:
Creates 2 images of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee images deal 33% damage, while Ranged images deal 28%. Illusions take %tooltip_damage_incoming_melee_total_pct%% damage Cooldown increased by %tooltip_ranged_cooldown_increase% seconds on ranged heroes.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

passive.name: Critical Strike
passive.desc: Grants each attack a 30% chance to deal 160% damage.

lore: The forward charge of the wyvern host grants no quarter.

passive.name: Dragon's Reach
passive.desc: Increases attack range of ranged heroes by 140.

lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

toggle.name: Unholy Strength
toggle.desc: When active, Unholy Strength grants +35 damage, +25 strength and +4 armor, but drains 40 health per second. You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated.

lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.desc:
Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.

While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.

If attacking to end the invisibility, you gain 175 bonus physical damage on that attack.

lore: Once used to slay an unjust king, only to have the kingdom erupt into civil war in the aftermath.

active.name: Shadow Walk
active.desc:
Makes you invisible for 14 seconds, or until you attack or cast a spell.

While invisible, you move 25% faster and can move through units.

Attacking to end the invisibility will deal 175 bonus physical damage to the target, and disable their passive abilities for 4 seconds.

attrib.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

attrib.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

lore: Two of three known items of unimaginable power that many believe were crafted at the same enchanter's forge.
Yasha and Kaya when paired together share a natural resonance.
Immense power at the cost of your soul.

active.name: Unholy RageIncreases
active.desc: Lifesteal percentage to 200% for 6 seconds. Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.desc: Heals the attacker for 25% of attack damage dealt.

lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

active.name: Static Charge
active.desc:
Places a charged shield on a target unit for 15 seconds which has a 20% chance to release a 225 magical damage shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.

Range: 800

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.desc: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 12 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 180 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

passive.name: Cold Attack
passive.desc: Attacks lower enemy movement and attack speed and reduces heals, health regeneration, lifesteal and spell lifesteal by 40% for 3 seconds. Slows enemy ranged units by -50% movement speed and by -50 attack speed. Slows enemy melee units by -25% movement speed and by -25 attack speed.

attrib.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

active.name: Dominate
active.desc:
Takes control of one neutral, non-ancient target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1000. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1000 retain their original max health.

Dominated unit's bounty is set to 100 gold.

Range: 700

lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

active.name: Dominate
active.desc:
Takes control of one neutral target unit and sets its movement speed to 380 and max health to a minimum of 1800. Also provides the unit with +25 base attack damage, +12 health regen, +4 mana regen and +4 armor. Dominated units with a max health of greater than 1800 retain their original max health.

Dominated unit's bounty is set to 150 gold.

Range: 700

lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.desc: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 140 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

lore: Bindings forged by impossible means to leash an ancient evil.

active.name: Eternal Chains
active.desc:
Roots all enemies in a target 450 radius for 2 seconds and deals 220 damage.

Range: 1100

passive.name: Chain Lightning
passive.desc: Grants a 30% chance on attack to release a bolt of electricity that leaps between 4 targets within a 650 radius, dealing 160 magical damage to each. Lightning proc pierces evasion.

lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

passive.name: Corruption
passive.desc: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -6 for 7 seconds.

lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

active.name: Berserk
active.desc:
Gives 110 attack speed and 30 movement speed, but reduces your armor by 8 and silences you.

Lasts 6 seconds.

passive.name: Lifesteal
passive.desc: Heals the attacker for 20% of attack damage dealt.

lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

active.name: Inhibit
active.desc:
Targets an enemy, slowing it for 4 seconds.

Range: 600

passive.name: Manabreak
passive.desc: Each attack burns 40 mana from the target, and deals 1 physical damage per burned mana. Burns 12 mana per attack from melee illusions and 8 mana per attack from ranged illusions.

lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

active.name: Ether Blast
active.desc:
Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

Lasts for 4 seconds on allies and 4 seconds on enemies.

Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 1.5x your primary attribute + 125 as magical damage.

Range: 800

lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those who wear it.

active.name: Sacrifice
active.desc:
Consume 170 health to temporarily gain 150 mana.

Lasts 10 seconds.

If the mana gained cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that will be used before your mana pool.

lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

active.name: Replenish Mana
active.desc:
Restores 160 mana to all nearby allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: At the core of spellcraft are spectrums only the very gifted can sense.

passive.name: Cooldown Reduction
passive.desc: Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items by 25%.

lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

passive.name: Poison Attack
passive.desc: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by -13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by -4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

lore: An unnerving stone unearthed beneath the Fields of Endless Carnage.

passive.name: Lesser Corruption
passive.desc: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -2 for 8 seconds.

lore: Seepage from the wounds of a warrior deity, sealed in an arcanist's orb following a campaign of vicious slaughter.

passive.name: Corrosion
passive.desc:
Dealing 3 damage per second, reducing armor by 3, and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged.

Lasts for 3 seconds.

lore: An enchanted blade that long ago raised a hopeless urchin from pauper to king.
Forged by a secret order in The Third Age of Praxa'cia to fell the False King.

passive.name: Mage Slayer
passive.desc: Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 4 seconds.

lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

active.name: Endurance
active.desc:
Consumes a charge and gives +45 attack speed and +13% movement speed to nearby allies for 6 seconds. Comes with 8 charges.

Radius: 1200

passive.name: Swiftness Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 20 movement speed to allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

active.name: Valor
active.desc:
If cast on an ally, grants them the 5 armor, and removing it from the caster. If cast on an enemy, reduces 5 armor on both the enemy and the caster. Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: 1000

lore: A talisman forged to honor the daytime sky.

active.name: Shine
active.desc:
When cast on an ally, grants them 6 armor, 65 attack speed, and 10% movement speed. When cast on an enemy, removes 6 armor, 65 attack speed, and 10% movement speed.

Removes the armor from the caster when used.

Cannot target spell immune enemies.

Range: 1000

lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

active.name: Magic Weakness
active.desc:
Cast a 600 radius blast that causes enemy heroes to take 18% increased damage from spells.

Range: 1200
Duration: 16 seconds.

passive.name: Basilius Aura
passive.desc:
Grants 1.75 mana regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

lore: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.

active.name: Mend
active.desc:
Restores 300 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

Radius: 1200
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

passive.name: Guardian Aura
passive.desc: Grants 2.5 health regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 20%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor. Radius: 1200

lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

active.name: Cripple
active.desc:
Roots the target for 2 seconds.

Range: 1100

lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

active.name: Overwhelm
active.desc:
Stuns a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Pierces Spell Immunity.

Range: 150

passive.name: Bash
passive.desc:
Grants melee heroes a 25% chance on hit to stun the target for 1.5 seconds and deal 100 bonus physical damage.

Bash chance for ranged heroes is 10%.

passive.name: Damage Block
passive.desc: Grants a 60% chance to block 70 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 35 damage on ranged.

attrib.footer: Self HP Regen and Lifesteal Amp

lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

active.name: Disarm
active.desc:
Prevents a target from attacking for 3 seconds on melee targets, and 5 seconds on ranged targets.

Range: 600

lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

passive.name: Break
passive.desc: Whenever you attack a hero or are attacked by any unit, the bonus 14 HP regen is lost and the movement speed bonus is reduced to 40 for 13 seconds.

lore: A small talisman that clouds the senses of one's enemies when held perfectly still.

active.name: Fade
active.desc:
Grants invisibility to you or a target allied hero as long as the target unit remains still.

Has a 1.25 second fade time, and breaks instantly upon moving. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

Range: 600

lore: The stolen cape of a master illusionist.

active.name: Glimmer
active.desc:
After a 0.6 second delay, grants invisibility and 45% magic resistance to you or a target allied unit for 5 seconds.

Range: 550
Can be cast while channelling.
